localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
blogPost.body: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
blogPost.title: Duplicates Monitor by Gemini 2 - Keep your Mac duplicate-free at all times
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 双子座2可以检测到你Mac的每个角落里的重复和类似文件，包括照片、音乐，甚至是外部驱动器。并帮助你释放大量的磁盘空间。此外，现在它能立即发现新的副本，以免它们再次堆积。
localize.tagline: 让你的 Mac 始终保持无复制状态

localize.description: 雙子座2可以檢測到你Mac的每個角落裏的重複和類似文件，包括照片、音樂，甚至是外部驅動器。並幫助你釋放大量的磁盤空間。此外，現在它能立即發現新的副本，以免它們再次堆積。
localize.tagline: 讓你的 Mac 始終保持無複製狀態

previous.title: Pullbacks only look healthy when they happen in other people's stocks.

localize.full_text: 回调只有发生在别人的股票上，才显得健康。
回調只有發生在別人的股票上，才顯得健康。

next.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
next.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。
